name: The Scarecrow Knight - Demo
description:
This mini demo has:

  • 4.6k+ words
  • 2 CGs
  • 1 "ending" (To be continued...)
Q&A

I wrote up a little Q&A style post about what you can expect from this game, how it relates to Red-Handed Robin, etc. If you're curious, check it out here.

Support Me!

If you like my games and want to support me, consider donating here on Itch or leaving me a tip on my Ko-fi!

Another non-monetary way you can show your support is by leaving a review. It really helps the game's visibility.

Social Media

Want to follow the development of the game? I post dev stuff on my Twitter and Tumblr!
